column1: The passage of the Ventim era

column2: Ventim expelled European mathematicians from the Bangbangting Mathematics Museum.
Ventim started working as a math teacher.
Ventim became the mathematician of the world.
Ventim mathematician killed the math virus and never saw him again.
Ventim mathematicians started selling math books and math games.
Ventim changed its name to the Ventim Math Museum.
